sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SAROS, in chronology, a period of 223 lunar months. The etymology of the word is said to be Chald√¶an, signifying restitution or return of eclipses ; that is, conjunctions of the sun and moon in nearly the same place of the ecliptic. The Saros was a cycle like that of Meto.
